businessProfile.name: Rosie D's Pizza
businessProfile.address: 5301 S Telegraph Rd, Dearborn Heights, MI 48125, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 5301 S Telegraph Rd, Dearborn Heights, MI 48125, USA

reviews.text: I‚Äôm so happy I tried a new place! Great pricing, service and quality! They have great specials too. Food is so good

i received a text message for my birthday, a coupon for a medium 2 topping pizza. the store was quite busy so i had to place my order online. because the coupon was pick up only, there was no code, i needed to present it in person. thankfully, the store called me directly after my order was placed to make sure the correct adjustments were made and even wished me a happy birthday!

the pizza was perfect! exactly what i needed after a long day.

This has been our go to for just about 20 years. Today I placed my last order. No cheese? Are you serious? I would have sent an email and have tried multiple times to call and let them know and left on hold.

I would not recommend getting anything from here. The quality has gone way downhill. We just ordered and the product is barely edible. It‚Äôs paper thin, dry, over cooked, and has way too much crust around the edge. Order a large, get the toppings of a small. Definitely not what it used to be.
Best pizza place in the area hands down. Nicest staff, always tries to fix a problem when they can. Absolute amazing ranch. Would recommend to anyone looking for delicious pizza for an amazing price.

editorial_summary.overview: Unpretentious takeaway & delivery joint specializing in budget pies & sandwiches.

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required

Test website on mobile devices manually

i received a text message for my birthday, a coupon for a medium 2 topping pizza. the store was quite busy so i had to place my order online. because the coupon was pick up only, there was no code, i needed to present it in person. thankfully, the store called me directly after my order was placed to make sure the correct adjustments were made and even wished me a happy birthday!

the pizza was perfect! exactly what i needed after a long day.

recentReviews.author: Anna Barrett
recentReviews.text: Best pizza place in the area hands down. Nicest staff, always tries to fix a problem when they can. Absolute amazing ranch. Would recommend to anyone looking for delicious pizza for an amazing price.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.4/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate receiving personalized text messages with special offers, such as birthday coupons, which enhance their experience and encourage repeat visits. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The staff is consistently recognized for their friendliness and proactive problem-solving, which enhances the overall customer experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The pizza is frequently praised for its quality and value, making it a standout choice in the area. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
improvementOpportunities: Difficulty in reaching the restaurant for feedback (calls left on hold) - review management can address this concern
Decline in product quality (barely edible, overcooked, and insufficient toppings) - review management can address this concern
Long-standing customers leaving due to dissatisfaction (20-year customer placing last order) - Boostly marketing services can improve this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
